feed.title: determining change addresses using the least significant digits

entry.title: determining change addresses using the least significant digits
entry.summary: On 2nd June 2015, Jeff Garzik responded to a query regarding adding additional inputs and outputs to increase privacy and defragment wallet. He stated that it can be done, and regular spends can resemble CoinJoin transactions and vice versa. The message ends with a note on supporting online privacy by using email encryption whenever possible and a link to learn more. Additionally, the message includes a PGP signature. There was also a non-text attachment included in the message, which is a file named "0xEAD9E623.asc" of type application/pgp-keys, with a size of 14416 bytes.
